name: Love-You Gesture: Medium-Dark Skin Tone
baseMeaning: American Sign Language gesture for 'I love you'.
tldr: I love you! ASL sign combining I, L, and Y for love.

contextMeanings.meaning: Rock on or cool vibes (often confused with rock sign).
Casual love expression or hyping something up.

platformNotes.note: Used for love expressions and rock vibes.
Common for expressing love or enthusiasm.
Popular for family and relationship messages.

generationalNotes.note: Often used interchangeably with rock sign.
Knows ASL meaning but also uses casually.
May know ASL meaning or confuse with rock sign.
